stimulusHtml: Nunavut in Canada is a semiautonomous region that allows an indigenous group within Canada to maintain their own culture and local government, reducing the threat of fragmentation. Which of the following best compares the impact of the creation of Nunavut at both local and national scales?
choicesHtml: It created centrifugal forces at both local and national scales.
It created centrifugal forces at the local scale but not the national scale.
It created centrifugal forces locally and centripetal forces nationally.
It created centripetal forces at the national scale but not the local scale.
It created centripetal forces at both local and national scales.
